page.title: 19LITTLE CLACTON TRAFFIC COUNT
page.content:
A lot of the people who we interviewed talked about the traffic coming through the village. We thought we would do a traffic count on a Sunday morning. The people who did the count sat next to the road between 9-12 on a Sunday morning and we counted the traffic going by. They would be mainly day trippers going to the sea. Passing through Little Clacton in 3 hours were :_ 2062 cars 38 coaches 31 motor bikes Altogether this is 2131 vehicles. This is more than 700 an hour or about 12 a minute or 1 car every 4 seconds.
And dont forget there are another 2131 vehicles to go back through our village in the evening !!
